name: Cloak of the Gathering Storm
tooltip:
Cloak of the Gathering StormLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Regal Drape, 2 Obsidian Idols, 5 Clay Scarabs and 5 Gold Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Regal Drape
- Obsidian Idol x 2
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
